nodes.text: Apru Del was a floating city that was located in the clouds of the planet Genarius.

During the time of the Clone Wars, the city served as the headquarters and training center for the space defense division of the Cularin Militia. Following the defection of the Trandoshan Xirossk from the Thaereian military, the Heroes of Cularin transported him to Apru Del, so that he could meet with Osten Dal'Nay, one of the leaders of the Militia.
